entry.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. entry.title: 0xlazar/jtdapp: A lightweight progressive web app for discovering curated Ethereum events around the world leading up to DevConnect in Buenos Aires. Built for explorers of the Ethereum ecosystem to visualize events on a global map, plan their journey, and connect with fellow travelers.
entry.content: A lightweight progressive web app for discovering curated Ethereum events around the world leading up to DevConnect in Buenos Aires. Built for explorers of the Ethereum ecosystem to visualize events on a global map, plan their journey, and connect with fellow travelers.

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. entry.content: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: SoshimeeDeveloper/Soshimee-Addons: Soshimee Addons is a ChatTriggers module for Hypixel SkyBlock Dungeons (F7/M7) that adds zero-ping terminals, blood room helpers, tick timers, party tools, and more. Built for Minecraft 1.8.9, it's a must-have for endgame dungeon runners. Lightweight, fast, and cheat-free.
entry.content: Soshimee Addons is a ChatTriggers module for Hypixel SkyBlock Dungeons (F7/M7) that adds zero-ping terminals, blood room helpers, tick timers, party tools, and more. Built for Minecraft 1.8.9, it's a must-have for endgame dungeon runners. Lightweight, fast, and cheat-free.
